name: py-terminal-banner
description: py-terminal-banner potentially impersonates the package terminal-banner. Because py-terminal-banner is delivered as a wheel, it will not automatically execute malicious code during setup.py installation. However, upon executing the generate_banner function, py-terminal-banner will open a reverse shell and attempt, then attempt to read and write the user's AWS credentials to an IP located in Brazil. The package is registered to Gabriel Machado, the name of a famous Brazilian football player.
